name: Backpack Zak
description:
Backpack Zac is a short top down dungeon adventure game inspired by games like The Legend of Zelda: Links Awakening and done in a traditional Gameboy art style.

Explore a castle littered with secrets and foes, while solving puzzles on your way to defeat the Evil King who has placed a curse on the lands.Controls
Z / X - Use Item or Select a New Item from the Item menu
Space - Menu
Arrow Keys - Move player / Navigate menu

Average Playtime
15 - 30 minutes

Music by Marllon Silva (xDeviruchi)
